Question
========
What must happen before you can push changes to GitHub.com?

Answerlist
----------
* You must open a pull request
* You must rename the repository
* You must commit your changes locally
* You must fork the repository

Solution
========
Pushing sends committed changes to GitHub.com, so you need a local commit first.

Answerlist
----------
* False
* False
* True
* False
